pkgmetadata.longdescription: Traffic Status Prediction in Urban Places using Neural Network Models // Estimate and return either the traffic speed or the car entries in the city of Thessaloniki using historical traffic data. It's used in transport pilot http://trafficstatusprediction.imet.gr/ of the 'BigDataEurope' project https://www.big-data-europe.eu/. There are functions for processing these data, training a neural network, select the most appropriate model and predict the traffic speed or the car entries for a selected time date.
